details.description: We start our trip from the famouse place Jemaa Lefna in center of Marrakech, Crossed the highest Atlas Through pass (Tizi N Tichka)

So we will visit the UNESCO World Heritage Site Ait Benhaddou / Official name Ksar of Ait-Ben-Haddou is located in south of Morocco, It is an ighrem (fortified village in English) (ksar in Arabic), along the former caravan route between the Sahara and Marrakech in present-day Morocco. Most citizens attracted by the tourist trade live in more modern dwellings in a village on the other side of the river, although there are four families still living in the ancient village. Inside the walls of the ksar are half a dozen (Kasbahs) or merchants houses and other individual dwellings
Pass trough the Ait Saouen Col in anti atlas
Crossed by the Draa valley, where there is more than 2 million palms along the draa river which stretches for a length to Senegal to the south.

hotels.title: Chic Urban Living in The heart of Ho Chi Minh City

overview.description: Opposite Durban’s famous beachfront, Blue Waters Hotel is within walking distance of the Suncoast Casino and the iconic Moses Mabhida Stadium. Both uShaka Marine World and Greyville Racecourse are within 2.5 mi from the property.@The spacious rooms and suites feature LCD TVs along with coffee-and-tea-making facilities. Each is equipped with air conditioning and a work desk. There is also plenty of luggage storage space. Most rooms come with furnished balconies and offer a view of the Indian Ocean.@Guests at Blue Waters can enjoy afternoon tea and cake in the Florida Lounge overlooking the ocean. The Versailles Restaurant provides buffet and á la carte service for lunch and dinner.@Leisure facilities at the Hotel Blue Waters include an indoor swimming pool, sauna and a squash court. There is also an outdoor rooftop swimming pool and guests can enjoy drinks with sunset views at the rooftop bar.@The Durban North Beach area is a good location for walking, running and cycling. Hotel Blue Waters is 5 minutes’ drive from the Durban ICC and 10 minutes’ drive from Durban’s city center. Durban Station is 1.2 mi away, while King Shaka International Airport is 19 mi from the property.@Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.1 for a two-person trip.@We speak your language!

information: Security deposit will not be collected at this hotel
Credit cards are not accepted at this hotel
No additional tax has to be paid at the hotel
Guests can check in using any Domestic or International ID proof with photograph

hotels.title: Modern Retreat in the Heart of Hanoi

overview.description: Located in the vibrant Ba Dinh district, this modern hotel offers easy access to Hoan Kiem Lake and the historic Old Quarter. Spacious rooms feature contemporary design, high-speed WiFi, and stunning city views. Guests can relax at the rooftop bar or enjoy authentic Vietnamese cuisine at the on-site restaurant. The hotel is just 3 miles from Noi Bai International Airport, making it ideal for both leisure and business travelers. Couples love the ambiance – they rated it 8.9 for a two-person trip.

information: No additional tax at the hotel

overview.description: Nestled along the pristine My Khe Beach, this luxury hotel offers breathtaking ocean views and world-class amenities. Each room is equipped with a private balcony, premium bedding, and smart TVs. Guests can unwind at the infinity pool or indulge in spa treatments. The hotel is a short drive from Marble Mountains and Hoi An Ancient Town. Perfect for romantic getaways, couples rate the location 9.5.

Immerse yourself in the rich history of Hue at this charming hotel located near the Imperial City. The rooms blend traditional Vietnamese decor with modern comforts like free WiFi and air conditioning. Guests can enjoy river views from the rooftop terrace or explore nearby attractions like the Perfume River and Dong Ba Market. Rated 8.7 by solo travelers.

Experience paradise at this beachfront resort in Nha Trang, featuring private villas and stunning ocean views. Guests can relax at the infinity pool, enjoy water sports, or dine at the seafood restaurant. The hotel is close to Vinpearl Land and Po Nagar Cham Towers. Couples rate it 9.6 for romantic stays.

Located along the vibrant Ninh Kieu Wharf, this hotel offers modern rooms with Mekong River views. Guests can explore the nearby Cai Rang Floating Market or relax at the rooftop lounge. The hotel features a fitness center and free bike rentals. Rated 8.9 for family stays.

hotels.title: Mountain Retreat in Da Lat
hotels.location: Da Lat City Center, Da Lat

overview.description: Nestled in the cool highlands of Da Lat, this hotel offers cozy rooms with views of pine forests and flower gardens. Guests can explore nearby attractions like the Valley of Love and Datanla Waterfall. The on-site restaurant serves local and international cuisine. Couples rate it 9.2 for romantic escapes.

This beachfront resort on Phu Quoc Island offers luxurious villas with private pools and direct access to Long Beach. Guests can enjoy water sports, spa treatments, or sunset cocktails at the beach bar. The resort is near Sao Beach and Phu Quoc Night Market. Rated 9.4 for luxury stays.

hotels.title: Historic Charm in Hoi An
hotels.location: Hoi An Ancient Town, Hoi An

overview.description: Located in the heart of Hoi An’s UNESCO-listed Ancient Town, this boutique hotel blends colonial charm with modern amenities. Guests can explore the Japanese Covered Bridge or relax by the pool. The hotel offers free bicycles and a lantern-making workshop. Rated 9.0 by culture enthusiasts.

hotels.title: City Vibes in Ho Chi Minh

overview.description: Situated in the bustling District 1, this hotel is steps away from Ben Thanh Market and Notre-Dame Basilica. Modern rooms feature city views and smart amenities. Guests can enjoy cocktails at the rooftop bar or explore nearby nightlife. Rated 8.8 for urban explorers.

This beachfront hotel in Vung Tau offers spacious rooms with ocean views and easy access to Back Beach. Guests can enjoy the outdoor pool, seafood dining, or explore attractions like the Christ of Vung Tau statue. Rated 8.9 for beach lovers.

Experience the tranquil beauty of the Mekong Delta at this riverside lodge. Rooms feature traditional decor and river views. Guests can take boat tours to floating markets or enjoy local dishes at the restaurant. Rated 8.7 for nature lovers.

This seaside resort in Quy Nhon offers luxurious rooms with balcony views of the South China Sea. Guests can relax at the infinity pool or explore nearby Eo Gio and Ky Co Beach. The resort features a spa and seafood restaurant. Rated 9.0 for relaxation.

Surrounded by terraced rice fields and misty mountains, this eco-friendly resort in Sapa offers cozy cabins with panoramic views. Guests can join trekking tours to local villages or relax at the spa. The restaurant serves organic dishes. Rated 9.3 for nature enthusiasts.

This stylish hotel in Hai Phong offers modern rooms with views of Do Son Beach. Guests can enjoy the rooftop pool, fitness center, or explore nearby Cat Ba Island. The on-site restaurant serves fresh seafood. Rated 8.8 for business travelers.

hotels.title: Island Escape in Con Dao
hotels.location: Con Dao Islands, Ba Ria-Vung Tau

overview.description: This luxury resort on Con Dao Islands offers private beach access and stunning ocean views. Guests can explore pristine beaches, dive in coral reefs, or visit historical sites like Con Dao Prison. The resort features a spa and gourmet dining. Rated 9.5 for island getaways.

Located in the cultural hub of Bac Ninh, this hotel offers easy access to Do Temple and traditional Quan Ho folk singing villages. Rooms feature modern amenities and local decor. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and free bike rentals. Rated 8.6 for cultural travelers.

This beachfront resort in Mui Ne offers spacious rooms with views of sand dunes and the ocean. Guests can enjoy kite surfing, explore the Fairy Stream, or relax at the spa. The resort features a seafood restaurant and poolside bar. Rated 9.0 for adventure seekers.

This modern hotel in Vinh City offers comfortable rooms with city views and easy access to Ho Chi Minh Square. Guests can enjoy the fitness center, on-site restaurant, or explore nearby Cua Lo Beach. Rated 8.5 for business and leisure travelers.

This luxury resort in Cam Ranh Bay offers private beach access and stunning ocean views. Guests can enjoy the infinity pool, spa treatments, or dine at the gourmet restaurant. The resort is a short drive from Nha Trang and Cam Ranh Airport. Rated 9.2 for luxury travelers.

This elegant hotel in Tam Ky offers a blend of colonial charm and modern comforts. Guests can explore nearby My Son Sanctuary or relax at the outdoor pool. The restaurant serves local Cham cuisine. Rated 8.9 for history buffs.
